We Will Be Happy To Contact With You: We Will Be Happy To Contact With You
Points, Stamps, and Discount Coupons Pro: Points, Stamps, and Discount Coupons Programs
feature_1: Let customers easily create a digital loyalty card with a single click and be automatically registered in your database.
feature_2: Offer customized loyalty programs, including points for spend, stamps for repeat visits, and discount coupons for specific spend levels.
feature_3: Encourage customers to refer friends and family with referral rewards, increasing your customer base and revenue.
feature_4: Publish your offers to all Pointechs users for maximum visibility.
feature_5: Categorize customers based on spending to better understand and retain them.
feature_6: Monitor the performance of your loyalty program and track your customer's activities and generate reports about each transaction.
feature_7: Publish your business information, including contact numbers and location, to all app users.
feature_8: Receive complaints and suggestions from customers and send notifications to keep them engaged, and let customers get notified automatically with any transaction.
why_p1: At Pointechs, we understand the importance of building and maintaining strong relationships with your customers. That's why we offer a simple and effective loyalty program solution that empowers businesses to increase customer retention, sales, and profitability.
why_p2: With Pointechs, Merchants can easily create and customize rewards that best fit their business and customers' needs.
why_p3: Our analytics tools make it easy to measure the effectiveness of your loyalty program. With Pointechs, you can keep track of points/stamps issued to each customer, know when and how many points/stamps are used, and analyze your customers' visit pattern to gain more insights.
join_p1: Join Pointechs today and start seeing the benefits of a successful and profitable business.
how-pointechs-works-p1: Register your business at (www.Pointechs.com) and set up your loyalty program rules.
how-pointechs-works-p2: Configure Branches, Locations and add your cashiers.
how-pointechs-works-p3: Customers can download the Pointechs app, create a profile, and issue their digital loyalty card
how-pointechs-works-p4: Cashiers can scan customer's digital card or use their mobile to reward or redeem points.
how-pointechs-works-p5: Access real-time analytics to measure the effectiveness of your loyalty program and make data-driven decisions. And keep track of points/stamps issued and used by each customer.
pointechs-app-p1: All your loyalty cards from different merchants are consolidated within the Pointechs app, simplifying your wallet and making it effortless to engage with multiple businesses.
pointechs-app-p2: Join the Pointechs community today and unlock a world of rewards, exclusive offers, and personalized shopping experiences.
pointechs-app-p3: Download the Pointechs mobile app now and start earning points with every purchase!
join_p2: Join the Pointechs family today and discover the benefits of a loyalty program that truly makes a difference!
footer_p: Build customized rewards & referrals programs to retain existing customers and attract new ones. Join Pointechs today and take the first step towards a thriving business.

feature_1_detial_2: Also, you can migrate from your plastic card system or any old system to Pointechs and migrate your customers points to Pointechs easily.
feature_1_detial_3: Go digital and get ready for the AI-driven business world.
feature_2_details_2: You can use the Points program to reward your customers based on their spendings.
feature_2_details_3: You can attract your customers using Digital Stamps system to let them make more visits.
feature_2_details_4: You can offer Discount Coupons if your customer spent a specific amount, and it can be redeemed against any future purchases.
feature_2_details_5: These are the most alluring ways to encourage your customers to continue to shop or use your services.
feature_3_details_2: Referral program and Giving points to be redeemed for customers has proven its efficiency to gain new customers and increase the revenue.
feature_6_details_2: You can generate many reports about each transaction, Analytics also help you identify critical information about your business.
feature_8_details_2: Customers get notified automatically with any transaction.
meta_description_one: Pointechs is a cutting-edge technology company that offers a unique and innovative loyalty program for merchants. Our mission is to help businesses increase their revenue and grow their customer base through personalized engagement
How can I register for POINTECHS?: How can I register for POINTECHS?

How do I manage my loyalty program with: How do I manage my loyalty program with POINTECHS?

FAQs1: POINTECHS is a comprehensive framework that enables merchants to implement loyalty programs for their customers. It helps businesses grow their revenue and establish strong relationships with their customers.
FAQs2: POINTECHS provides a web portal for merchants to register and customize their loyalty programs. Merchants can configure loyalty rules, manage branches and locations, and assign cashiers. Cashiers have their own portals to give points and redeem them based on the merchant's rules. Customers can download Pointechs mobile application to issue their loyalty cards, track their points, view merchant offers, and send suggestions or complaints to merchant admins.
FAQs3: To register for POINTECHS, please visit our website and click on the 'Register' button. Fill out the required information, and our team will get in touch with you to complete the registration process.
FAQs4: Absolutely! POINTECHS allows you to fully customize your loyalty program to suit your business needs. Through the web portal, you can configure loyalty rules, set up branches and locations, and personalize your program according to your preferences.
FAQs5: Managing your loyalty program is easy with POINTECHS. The web portal provides a user-friendly interface where you can monitor program performance, track customer engagement, and analyze data to make informed decisions. You can also generate reports and gain valuable insights into your customers' behavior.
FAQs6: POINTECHS offers flexible pricing options based on your business requirements. We have both monthly and yearly subscription plans available. Please contact our sales team or refer to our pricing page on the website for detailed information.
FAQs7: Yes, POINTECHS is designed to cater to businesses of all sizes and industries. Whether you run a retail store, restaurant, salon, or any other establishment, our framework can be tailored to meet your specific loyalty program needs.
FAQs8: We provide comprehensive support for all POINTECHS users. If you have any questions, concerns, or technical issues, our customer support team is available to assist you. You can reach us through email, or by submitting a support ticket through the web portal.
FAQs9: Absolutely! We take data security and privacy seriously. POINTECHS employs robust security measures to protect your data and ensure its confidentiality. We adhere to industry best practices and comply with relevant data protection regulations.
FAQs10: To get started with POINTECHS, simply visit our website and click on the 'Get Started' button. Fill out the provided form, and our team will guide you through the onboarding process and help you set up your loyalty program.
termsAndConditionsParagraphs: Pointechs is a loyalty framework that allows businesses to create and manage their own customized loyalty programs. The Pointechs platform is owned and operated by Kaizen Gate, and all content and materials on the website are the property of Kaizen Gate.These terms and conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the Pointechs loyalty framework ("Framework") provided by Kaizen Gate ("Company"). By accessing and using the Framework, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from using the Framework.
terms1_explanation_1: Eligibility: To access and use the Framework, you must be a registered merchant, cashier, or customer with Kaizen Gate. You agree to provide accurate, up-to-date, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information as necessary.
terms1_explanation_2: Account Security: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for any activity that occurs under your account. You agree to promptly notify Kaizen Gate of any unauthorized access or use of your account.
terms2_explanation_1: Merchant Program: Pointechs enables merchants to create and manage their own customized loyalty programs through the provided merchant portal. This allows merchants to incentivize customer loyalty.
terms2_explanation_2: Customer Engagement: Customers can join merchant loyalty programs through the Pointechs mobile application. By participating in a loyalty program, customers agree to comply with the specific terms and conditions set by the respective merchant.
terms3_explanation_1: Prohibited Activities: You agree not to engage in any of the following activities:
terms3_explanation_1_more_details_1: Violating any applicable laws, regulations, or third-party rights.
terms3_explanation_1_more_details_2: Uploading, posting, or transmitting any unlawful or offensive content or content that infringes intellectual property rights.
terms3_explanation_1_more_details_3: Attempting to interfere with the functionality, security, or integrity of the Framework.
terms3_explanation_1_more_details_4: Engaging in any activity that may disrupt or cause harm to Kaizen Gate's servers, systems, or network.
terms3_explanation_2: Intellectual Property: All content and materials on the Framework, including but not limited to trademarks, logos, text, graphics, and software, are owned by Kaizen Gate or licensed to the Company. You agree not to use, reproduce, distribute, or modify any copyrighted materials without obtaining prior consent from Kaizen Gate.
terms4_explanation_1: Framework Availability: Kaizen Gate strives to provide a reliable and continuously available Framework. However, we do not guarantee that the Framework will be error-free or available at all times. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Framework without prior notice.
terms4_explanation_2: Indemnification: You agree to indemnify and hold Kaizen Gate harmless from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising from your use of the Framework or any violation of these Terms.
terms4_explanation_3: Limitation of Liability: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW: (a) IN NO EVENT SHALL KAIZEN GATE, ITS AFFILIATES OR THEIR RESPECTIVE EMPLOYEES, CONTRACTORS, AGENTS, OFFICERS OR DIRECTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION DAMAGES FOR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION, LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, USE, DATA OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THE SITE; AND (b) IN NO EVENT SHALL KAIZEN GATE’S CUMULATIVE AND AGGREGATE LIABILITY UNDER THESE TERMS EXCEED FIFTY U.S. DOLLARS. THE EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS IN THIS SECTION APPLY WHETHER THE ALLEGED LIABILITY IS BASED ON CONTRACT, TORT, NEGLIGENCE, STRICT LIABILITY OR ANY OTHER BASIS, EVEN IF YOU HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
terms5_explanation_1: Modification of Terms: Kaizen Gate reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. Any changes will become effective immediately upon posting the updated Terms on the Framework. Your continued use of the Framework after such modifications constitutes your agreement to the amended Terms.
terms5_explanation_2: Termination: Kaizen Gate may terminate or suspend your access to the Framework, in whole or in part, without prior notice. Upon termination, all licenses and rights granted to you under these Terms will immediately cease.
terms6_explanation_1: Governing Law: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of laws principles.
terms6_explanation_2: Dispute Resolution: Any dispute arising out of or related to these Terms shall be resolved through negotiation and, if necessary, through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association. Each party agrees to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in the United States for any legal proceedings.
terms7_explanation_1: These Terms constitute the complete and exclusive statement of the agreement between the Parties and supersede all proposals, oral or written, and all other communications between the Parties relating to the subject matter of these Terms. In the event any information posted on the Site from time-to-time conflicts with any provision of these Terms, the applicable provision of these Terms shall control. Any terms and conditions of any other instrument issued by you in connection with these Terms which are in addition to, inconsistent with or different from these Terms shall be of no force or effect. These Terms do not, and shall not be construed to, create any partnership, joint venture, employer-employee, agency or franchisor-franchisee relationship between you and KAIZEN GATE. You may not assign, transfer or sublicense all or any of your rights or obligations under these Terms without KAIZEN GATE’s express prior written consent. KAIZEN GATE may assign, transfer or sublicense all or any of KAIZEN GATE’s rights or obligations under these Terms without restriction. The failure of KAIZEN GATE to exercise or enforce any condition, term or provision of these Terms will not operate as a waiver of such condition, term or provision. Any waiver by KAIZEN GATE of any condition, term or provision of these Terms shall not be construed as a waiver of any other condition, term or provision. If any provision of these Terms is held invalid or unenforceable, the remainder of these Terms shall continue in full force and effect. You agree that a printed version of these Terms and of any notice given in electronic form shall be admissible in judicial or administrative proceedings based upon or relating to these Terms to the same extent and subject to the same conditions as other business documents and records originally generated and maintained in printed form. Kaizen Gate may collect and use your personal information in accordance with our privacy policy. KAIZEN GATE will not be responsible for failures to fulfill any obligations due to causes beyond its control. Non-English translations of these Terms are provided for convenience only. In the event of any ambiguity or conflict between translations, the English version is authoritative and controls.
support_sentence_FAQs: If you have any additional questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us at
support_sentence_terms_and_conditions: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us at
privacyPolicyParagraphs: Effective Date: 13- Jun - 2023 Thank you for choosing POINTECHS! This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect personal information about our merchants and their customers. We are committed to maintaining the privacy and security of the information provided to us. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacy_1_header_1: Merchants: When merchants register and use our services, we may collect the following types of information:
privacy_1_header_1_detail_1: Contact information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.
privacy_1_header_1_detail_2: Business information: Business name, address, industry type, and other relevant details.
privacy_1_header_1_detail_3: Billing information: Payment details, such as credit card information or other financial account information.
privacy_1_header_1_detail_4: Loyalty program configuration: Loyalty rules, branches, locations, cashier information, and other program-specific details.
privacy_1_header_1_detail_5: Communication preferences: Your preferences for receiving communications from us.
privacy_1_header_2: Customers: When customers use our mobile application or interact with our merchants, we may collect the following types of information:
privacy_1_header_2_detail_1: Personal information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.
privacy_1_header_2_detail_2: Loyalty card information: Loyalty card numbers, points balance, transaction history, and other relevant details.
privacy_1_header_2_detail_3: Location information: If enabled, we may collect and store location information when customers use our mobile application.
privacy_1_header_2_detail_4: Feedback and communication: Suggestions, complaints, or other feedback provided by customers to merchants or our support team.
privacy_2_header_1: Merchants: We use the information collected from merchants to:
privacy_2_header_1_detail_1: Provide and improve our services, including loyalty program configuration and management.
privacy_2_header_1_detail_2: Process payments and communicate with merchants about billing and account-related matters.
privacy_2_header_1_detail_3: Send transactional emails, updates, and other relevant information related to our services
privacy_2_header_1_detail_4: Respond to inquiries, support requests, and provide customer service.
privacy_2_header_1_detail_5: Conduct research and analysis to improve our services and develop new features.
privacy_2_header_2: Customers: We use the information collected from customers to:
privacy_2_header_2_detail_1: Enable loyalty card issuance and track points and rewards.
privacy_2_header_2_detail_2: Provide personalized offers and promotions from merchants.
privacy_2_header_2_detail_3: Communicate with customers regarding their loyalty program status and updates.
privacy_2_header_2_detail_4: Respond to inquiries, support requests, and provide customer service.
privacy_2_header_2_detail_5: Analyze data to improve our services and enhance the customer experience.
privacy_3_header_1_detail_1: We may engage trusted third-party service providers to perform various functions necessary to provide our services. These providers may have access to personal information and are obligated to protect it in a manner consistent with this Privacy Policy.
privacy_3_header_2_detail_1: We may disclose personal information if required to do so by law or if we believe that such action is necessary to comply with a legal obligation, protect our rights or the rights of others, or investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, or situations involving potential threats to the safety of any person.
privacy_4_detail: We implement reasonable security measures to protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of personal information. However, no data transmission over the internet or electronic storage system can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.
privacy_5_header_1_detail_1: Merchants have control over their loyalty program configuration and the personal information collected from customers. They can access, modify, or delete this information through their account settings.
privacy_5_header_2_detail_1: Customers have the right to access, correct, or delete their personal information held by merchants. They can exercise these rights by contacting the relevant merchant directly. We will cooperate with merchants to fulfill customer requests within a reasonable timeframe.
privacy_6_detail: We reserve the right to update or change this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be effective upon posting the revised policy on our website. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates.
support_sentence_pravicy_policy: If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
